string.text: I need some equipment.
You understand, normal stuff is only available for artifacts and only in good condition, you can pawn off the rotten crap to the youngsters in the village...\nSo what exactly do you need?
Ammo, equipment...
Good weapons...
To fix my health...
Repair kits...

From ammo I can offer for first level artifacts:
1. 12x70 buckshot cartridges
2. 12x76 canister shot cartridges
3. 12x76 zhekan cartridges

From ammo I can offer for first level artifacts:
1. 12x70 buckshot cartridges
2. 12x76 canister shot cartridges
3. 12x76 zhekan cartridges
4. Dynamite
Alright, I won't buy anything for now...
Give me the buckshot...
Need canister shot...
I'll take the zhekans...
Need explosives...
For an artifact I give five packs of buckshot... Agreed?
Take this, whatever you do...
I have an artifact, take it...
Three packs of canister shot for an artifact... You taking it?
Need canister shot, otherwise I wouldn't even bother asking...
Two packs of cartridges for a first level artifact... You taking it?
I'll take them, can't do without them...
A crate of dynamite will cost you a "Dummy" class artifact... Got one?
Expensive, but the need is strong. Here...
Well, look. Dynamite's in the old place, in the first house from the road. Hurry up, get it out of there as far as possible. You never know...
No, maybe next time...

For now I can offer for artifacts:
1. TOZ-34 "Vertikalka"
2. TOZ-66
3. Short-barreled MP-133 shotgun
I'll take the TOZ-34...
Perhaps, I'll take the TOZ-66...
Let me try the MP-133...
For the TOZ-34 two simple artifacts, first level, or one good one. Agreed?
TOZ-66 - for it two simple artifacts or one better one, second level. Does that work?
Yeah, here's a pair, take it, whatever you do...
I have a second level artifact, will it work?
Yes, here's a pair of simple ones..., take them.
Here's a second level artifact, take it.
The shortened MP-133 only in exchange for two second level artifacts... Well, or four first level artifacts. You taking it?
Four first level artifacts, here...
Here are two good artifacts...
For now I can offer medkits or, heh-heh, vodka...\nAlright, just for you - got a bit of antirad...
I'll take medkits...
Can't survive in the Zone without vodka...
Give me antirad! Tired of treating myself with vodka.
For ten medkits one second level artifact, or five for a simple artifact... Agreed?
Five is enough, take the simple one...
Here's a good artifact, give me the medkits...
Three bottles in exchange for an artifact! You taking it?
I'll take it, I'll take it... Here's... an "artifact".
So, for a simple artifact I give a couple of antirads. For a second level artifact - five pieces... And if you don't mind parting with a rare, third level artifact, I'll give a dozen and a half.
I'll take it, I'll take it... Here's a simple artifact...
Here I have a second level artifact.
Don't mind... Here's third level!

I can offer:
1. Repair kits for armor
2. Repair kits for weapons
3. Case for repair kits
I'll take the armor ones.
Weapon ones are more needed.
Probably I'll take the case.
For five kits one second level artifact... Agreed?
Agreed, whatever you do...
Five weapon kits in exchange for one second level artifact... You taking it?
Yes, I'll take them. Weapons break down often...
Two artifacts...
Yes, yes, here take a couple...
I want to buy some equipment.
The main currency in the Zone - artifacts! I run this like an exchange: won't take torn and crumpled currency. In other words, don't bring me any used junk, got it?\nSo what interests you?
Ammo, equipment...
Good weapons...
To fix my health...
Repair kits...

Well... From ammo there's:
1. .357 Magnum cartridges
2. 12-gauge cartridges
3. Grenades for NATO underbarrel launcher
4. Silencer for Glock 18C pistol
Don't need anything for now...
Give me .357 Magnum cartridges...
How much will you give for smooth-bore?
How many grenades for underbarrel will you give?
What kind of silencer do you want?
Three packs for a first level artifact.
For a second level artifact - nine packs of buckshot, six packs of canister shot or four packs of zhekans...
Give me buckshot. Here's the artifact...
I'll take canister shot, here you go.
Give me zhekans, here you go.
I'll take them, here's the artifact.
For four grenades - I ask for one simple artifact.
Well, if it's simple - let's do it.
A mere trifle - any second level artifact.
For some a trifle, for others not so much. But it's a really necessary gadget. Agreed.
No, maybe next time...

From "good" weapons:
1. Glock 17 pistol
2. Glock 18C pistol
3. BT MP9 submachine gun
4. MP-153 shotgun
Need a Glock!
Glock 18C, let's go!
I'll take the MP9!
I'll take the shotgun!
For Glock 17 three first level artifacts. Agreed?
I have three simple ones, the Glock is worth it... I hope.
Glock 18C in exchange for one third level artifact plus one second level... How about it?
Agreed! Here are the artifacts.
BT MP9 submachine gun in exchange for a third level artifact... You taking it?
I have an excellent artifact. Here.
For the shotgun - four second level artifacts. Well, if you're not being cheap, you can pay with one third level artifact plus one first level.
Here are four second level artifacts, the MP-153 is worth it...
One third level, one first level. Take them...
For health improvement I offer either medkits, vodka, or antirad.
I'll take medkits...
I'll take vodka, anti-stress, you understand!...
Give me antirad!
For four medkits one "Jellyfish" class artifact, well, or 10 at once - for one higher level artifact.
Here's a good artifact, give me ten medkits.
Give me four, here's a simple artifact.
Two bottles for a simple artifact, or seven half-liters for a good one. You taking it?
Here's a simple one. That'll do for now.
So: one antirad for a simple artifact, four for a second level artifact, ten for a third level... Well what?
Here's a simple one. That'll do for now.
Got a second level one... That'll do for now.
Give me ten! Here's the artifact...
Give me more - here take the artifact!
For repair I can offer repair kits for armor and weapons. Well, and a case for repair kits.
I'll take the armor ones.
Weapon ones are more needed.
Give me the case.
For three kits one second level artifact. Or for a simple artifact one kit. What do we decide?
Give me three. They'll come in handy...
Ah! I'll make do with one for now...
For the case I ask you to pile on simple artifacts - 3 pieces, you taking it?
Simple artifacts... Well, here take these...
For three kits one second level artifact. Or for a simple artifact one kit. What do we decide?
Give me three, here you go...
Eh, having trouble with artifacts, one will do for now.
I need some equipment.
If you have artifacts, then no problem. But keep in mind, worn ones don't interest me...\nSo what do you want to get?
Ammo...
Good weapons...
Something for health...
Weapon attachments...

I can offer:
1. 7.62x54 mm cartridges
2. 7.62x39 mm cartridges
3. 9x39 mm cartridges
4. 5.45x39 mm cartridges
5. VOG-25 shots for underbarrel grenade launcher

I have this to offer:
1. "Vityaz-SN" submachine gun
2. AK-104 "Tactic" assault rifle
3. VSS "Vintorez" rifle
4. AS "Val" assault rifle
I only have military medkits...
Currently I have in stock:\n1. "Kobra", "Rakurs", "OKP" collimator sights\n2. Silencers for 5.45 and 7.62, including for SVD.
Need cartridges for SVD.
I'll take underbarrel grenades.
Give me cartridges for AKM...
Give me 9x39 cartridges for "Vintorez"...
I'll take cartridges for AK-74...
For one first level artifact I give three packs of 7N1 or two 7N14, well or one pack of armor-piercing 7N26. What will you choose?
For one first level artifact I can offer four VOG-25. You taking it?
Four packs of standard cartridges for one simple artifact.
Five packs of simple ones, four sniper ones or three armor-piercing for a second level artifact... Which will you choose?
I give one hundred fifty simple cartridges for a first level artifact.
Give me standard sniper 7N1...
I need sniper armor-piercing 7N14 cartridges...
I'll take armor-piercing 7N26...
Deal.
One hundred twenty pieces... I'll take them.
Give me five simple ones, here's the artifact.
Here's the artifact. I'll take sniper ones.
Armor-piercing - they drop a bloodsucker instantly. Take the artifact...
I have a simple artifact, I'll take them.
"Vityaz"? Excellent gun, I'll take it...
I'll take the AK-104 "Tactic"...
All my life I've dreamed of shooting a "Vintorez"...
The Val should be a good gun...
For "Vityaz" - I'll take a third level artifact. Agreed?
AK-104 "Tactic" in exchange for two third level artifacts. Got any?
"Vintorez" only in exchange for one excellent artifact and one simpler one. Just look, optics aren't included, you'll have to pay separately for the collimator sight... You taking it?
"Val" only in exchange for one excellent artifact and two simpler ones. Just look, optics aren't included, you'll have to pay separately for the collimator sight... You taking it?
Yes, agreed...
Yes, I have them...
Of course, I'll take it!
What do you want for them?
For three medkits one second level artifact or two first level... Agreed?
Take it, here's a second level one, whatever you do...
Here's a pair of first level ones, take them...
"Kobra" wouldn't hurt...
I'd like "Rakurs"...
"OKP" is a good sight...
Want a silencer for SVD...
Silencer for AK-74 will definitely come in handy...
Need a silencer for 7.62 assault rifles...
Got anything... unusual?
Such a sight will cost you two second level artifacts. What do you say?
Even now I'll exchange it for a second level artifact.

Unusual? Well, there's an underbarrel grenade launcher for "Groza". Last one left. There were only a few pieces total. Such weapons are rare, purely for specialists. Interested? I'll give it for a third level artifact.
Hmm... right now, probably nothing. Though sometimes they bring quite rare specimens. Drop by more often, you know the way.
Well, I'll take it, I guess. Here's the artifact.
Alright, then see you later.
Was afraid you'd totally rip me off, but it's still quite reasonable. Take the artifacts.
No problem. Here, take it...
Changed my mind, won't take anything for now.
You're asking too much...
I want to exchange artifacts, show me what you have.
Please. Look, choose...
Brought some artifacts...
Want to look at what we can offer for your finds? Let's...
Yes, let's have a look...
Good, good...
You're interested in all kinds of information, as I understand. Should I bring you any rare papers?
You think correctly. If you find something interesting - bring it. I'm interested in such things.
Got it, I'll bring it if I come across something...
I brought you something here... Will you look?
You brought something? Well then, show me.
Look.
So-so, so-so.
Can you hook me up with some goods?
I can trade. Got any artifacts that ain't fucked up? Won't take used ones, just so you know.\nWhat exactly do you need?
Ammo, grenades...
Good weapons...
For health improvement...
Repair accessories...
Maybe you have .338 Lapua Magnum ammo in stock... or attachments...

From ammo for simple artifacts:
1. 5.56 cartridges for NATO guns
2. F-1 grenades
3. Grenades for NATO underbarrel launcher
4. Drum with 5.56x45 mm cartridges
For second level artifacts:
1. 7.62 NATO cartridges
Don't need anything, no artifacts...
Give me 5.56 cartridges...
Need grenades...
I'll take grenades for underbarrel...
I'll take the drum...
I'll take NATO ones...
For one first level artifact I can hook up five packs of simple cartridges. How about it?
Give me five simple ones...
Three grenades - one simple artifact... You taking it?
Need grenades, otherwise I wouldn't even bother.
Four shots - first level artifact... You taking it?
I'll take them, need them badly...
One drum. For one simple artifact... Agreed?
Yeah. Let's do it.
For one second level artifact I can hook up four packs of simple cartridges. How about it?
Yeah, I'll take them.
No, maybe next time...

From weapons I can offer: 
1. HK USP pistol
2. FN FNX-45 pistol
3. Springfield 1911 pistol

From weapons I can offer: 
1. Benelli M4 Super 90 (M1014) shotgun
2. HK USP pistol
3. FN FNX-45 pistol
4. Springfield 1911 pistol
Benelli M4 Super 90 (M1014)? Alright, let me try it.
Holy shit, always wanted to hold a USP in my hands!
FN FNX-45? Well let's have a look at it.
Springfield 1911! That's a world classic, I'll take it!
I ask for five second level artifacts or two third level ones. "Dummy" class will also work. If you don't mind, of course.
Here, take five second level ones...
Take them, cheapskate, two third level ones...
I hate to part with it, but what can you do. Really caught my eye, this little gun. Here's the artifact.
Three second level artifacts - and do whatever you want with it.
Here are your artifacts.
Give me one third level artifact - and it's yours.
Here.
Just two second level artifacts - and you can own it.
Take the artifacts.
For now I can offer:\n1. Medkits for simple artifacts\n2. Antirad for second level artifacts
I'll take medkits...
Can't survive in the Zone without antirad...
For a pair of military medkits - one first level artifact... Agreed?
Take it, whatever you do...
Five antirad in exchange for a second level artifact... You taking it?
I'll take them, I'll take them... If I don't need them myself, I'll trade them...
Repair kits for second level artifacts.
I'll take the armor ones.
Weapon ones are more needed.
For four kits one artifact... Agreed?
Agreed, whatever you do...
Four weapon kits in exchange for a decent artifact... You taking it?
Yes, I'll take them. Weapons break down often...

For now I can offer:
1. .338 Lapua Magnum
2. .338 Lapua Magnum AP
3. 5.56 silencer
4. 7.62 NATO silencer
I'll take the simple ones...
Give me armor-piercing...
I'll take a silencer for 5.56x45...
I'd take a silencer for 7.62x51 NATO...
For 5 packs of simple ones pay with a third level artifact... Agreed?
Deal.
For 3 packs of armor-piercing I want a third level artifact... Does that work?
Yes, I'll take them.
Silencer for 5.56x45 - second level artifact. Need it?
I'll take it, I'll take it...
Silencer for 7.62x51 NATO - second level artifact. Agreed?
I'll take it, I guess.
And what's this character doing here without guards? You here to see me or what?
To see you? And who are you?

What the hell! Don't even know me! That's insulting! I feed all the homies here, you could say. They wouldn't last two days without papa Veins. Strange that you haven't heard of me... Or are you some newbie loser, a roadside nobody? What should I call you, clueless one?
I'm Marked One, haven't heard? And you're the cook, I guess?
What the hell cook! I gather grub for the bros. Trade it with visiting stalkers and, sometimes, take it off corpses... Sausage, canned food and other delights of normal food. You get it?
Like a quartermaster, got it. And if there are no "corpses" then what goes into business?

All sorts of stuff... We don't do cannibalism, if that's what you're thinking. Sometimes pork, boar... Can visit Ignat in the Gut from time to time. He's learned to almost completely eliminate that monster stench. In short: your grub - our gear! Bring it on, Marked One...
Let's see.
Aha! You again? And again without guards. What this time?
Still stocking up on grub? Think I have something for you to trade...

Well, show me what you got. Keep in mind, there ain't no freezers here, and everything spoils fast. So if you dragged in rotten crap, you'll be eating it yourself.\nSo what do you want to stock up on?
What ammo is there? Or something else?
You dealing guns?
What do you have for health?
Can you hook me up with something for repairs?
Heard you got PDAs of all kinds?

Not much ammo:
1. 5.45x39 mm cartridges for Kalash. Five packs of simple ones - for five canned foods
2. RGD-5 grenades. Two energy drinks - one piece
3. 9x19 mm cartridges, regular - three cans of energy drink for two packs
4. F-1 grenade - one canned food and an energy drink with it
Don't need anything for now...
I'll take cartridges for Kalash.
Need grenades.
Give me nines.
I'll take the F-1.
Show me the canned food first...
There they are, don't worry...
Could really use some energy drink right now, getting sleepy...
No problem, here you go. Hand over the grenade...
Want to drink, water situation here is totally fucked...
Here, wet your throat...
No doubt about it. We need snacks and drinks.
Should take care of your liver. Here...
No, maybe next time...

Want a gun? Well choose:
1. SR-2MP "Veresk" submachine gun for 15 canned foods
2. "Bizon-2" submachine gun in excellent condition - for 20 army rations
3. SIG Sauer P250 pistol - just for 10 army rations
4. Molot OP-SKS carbine for 8 hunting sausages
5. 9mm silencer for 5 hunting sausages
Give me the SR-2MP "Veresk".
I'll take the "Bizon".
I'll take the SIG Sauer P250.
Wrap up the Molot OP-SKS.
Give me the silencer.
Draw up the canned foods...
Don't worry, I won't screw you...
Brought rations? Not expired?
Even if they're expired, still better than your pig slop. Take it already.
Where are the rations? Not opened at least?
Here, businessman, you can check...
Brought sausage?
Here, penny-pincher...
Where's the sausage?
Take it, dealer
Need to fix your health? Here, look:\n1. Medkit for two hunting sausages\n2. Vodka for four canned foods
I'll take a medkit...
Give me vodka...
Hand over the sausage. Not spoiled at least?
Yeah seems you can eat it. Smell it yourself...
Draw up the canned foods quickly...
One, two... here, four cans.
Got some repair kits:\n1. For armor - three cans of energy drink\n2. For weapons - army ration for two kits
I'll take the armor ones.
Weapon ones are more needed.
Show me the energy drinks...
Take them, here's three cans...
Oh, at least some normal grub to chow down!
Don't get too excited, rations aren't so easy to get. But today - party time...

Heard? Well... Alright, got a little, can trade: ten canned foods or five fresh hunting sausages, for one PDA. Just keep in mind, they don't turn on, maybe just the battery's dead, or maybe they're completely fucked...
Alright, let me take it, maybe I'll charge it up.
What are you trading for?
Take them, here's the canned foods...
Hunting ones, as you asked...
Don't have that much right now. Maybe I'll come back.
Can you hook me up with some equipment?
Why not?! Bring vodka and you'll have happiness... Depending on the number of bottles.\nWhat exactly do you need?
Ammo, grenades...
Can you get an assault rifle or machine gun?
They say the military has unique medicines or products...
I heard you guys have good tactical gear...

Well... can trade for vodka:
1. 5.45x39 mm cartridges for AK-74
2. F-1 grenades
3. For PKM machine gun 7.62x54 mm R ammo belts
4. 7.62x39 mm cartridges for AKM
5. Drum with 5.45x39 mm cartridges for RPK
Don't need anything for now...
I'll take cartridges for AK-74...
Give me grenades, F-1 really helps against the evil...
For PKM? I'll take it, I guess...
I'll take cartridges for AKM...
I'll take the drum for RPK...
I can give five packs of simple cartridges for three bottles.
Five packs, I'll take them.
Want grenades, you say?
Need grenades, otherwise I wouldn't even bother.
One crate of cartridges - six bottles.
Agreed...
I can give four packs of simple cartridges for four bottles.
Four packs, I'll take them.
One drum for two bottles.
I'll take it.
No, next time.

I can get:
1. Walther P99 pistol
2. "OTs-33 Pernach" pistol, very reliable machine
3. RPK-74 - though somewhat heavy, but very convenient and drops evil instantly
4. Legendary Soviet AKM
Walther P99? How much you asking?
How much for the Pernach?
For the machine gun, need a lot of vodka?
For how much will you give the "legend"?
Just eight bottles. Agreed?
Just ten bottles! Agreed?
Bring a dozen... no! Fifteen pieces - and you'll have a Walther P99. Agreed?
Alright, eight, so eight...
Agreed, here's ten bottles...
Fifteen bottles. How about it?
Here they are, all fifteen.
Machine gun - it's not a small thing, hard to carry out... You'll have to shell out. Twenty bottles, deal?
Machine gun - it's not a small thing, hard to carry out... You'll have to shell out. Forty bottles, deal?
I got forty bottles. Here!
Agreed! Let's do it!
I'll let it go for fifteen bottles of the clear stuff. Deal?
I'll let it go for twenty bottles of the clear stuff. Deal?
Hear them clinking in my backpack, darling? Take them.
Yeah right, those dogs... They don't give us these new things they show at exhibitions. Just our usual, army, medkits and rations.

Yeah, they threw in a batch for special forces recently. Everyone's praising them. Not cheap mass production, you understand yourself... So it'll cost you twenty-five bottles. Can you handle it? And if you agree to donate what you're wearing to my exchange fund, then we'll bargain for a case.
Deal. Hope it's worth it. Take them, exactly twenty bottles...
Wow, you really know how to drive a hard bargain! I'll come back later, maybe.
Excellent! I guarantee you'll come back later to say "thank you" to Sherstyuk. You know what container I prefer to receive gratitude in? Just kidding.
How many medkits will you give?
Wouldn't hurt to have some rations...
Medkit for a bottle.
For two bottles? Well, I'll give a medkit. One.
Ration for a bottle.
Two bottles for a ration.
Three bottles for a ration.
Deal!
Excellent!
I'm about that exchange. I need something...
Bring vodka, maybe I can help. Depending on the number of bottles.\nWhat exactly do you want?
Get out of here, Marked One. I heard you were seen when you killed my classmate, Seryoga, in Dark Valley. If I knew for sure it was you - I'd shoot you!
I'm leaving, I'm leaving.
Ammo, grenades, maybe good armor...
Can you get an assault rifle or machine gun?
They say the military has unique medicines...
I heard people praise army tactical gear...

Well... can trade for vodka:
1. 5.45x39 mm cartridges for AK-74
2. RGD-5 grenades
3. 7.62x39 mm cartridges

Ha! Of course! Army means reliable. They just threw in a batch for special forces recently. With such you can carry half the RAV warehouse of our regiment on yourself. Not cheap mass production, you understand yourself... So it'll cost you twenty-five bottles. Can you handle it? And if you agree to donate what you're wearing to my exchange fund, then we'll bargain for a case.
Ha! Of course! Army means reliable. But right now I can't get you one, very few left in the warehouse, all under report. Maybe they'll throw in more later.
Deal. Hope it's worth it. Take them, exactly twenty bottles...
Wow, you really know how to drive a hard bargain! I'll stop by later... probably.
Excellent! I guarantee you'll come back later to say "thank you" to Kuznetsov. You know what container I prefer to receive gratitude in? Just kidding.
Too bad... I'll drop by another time then.
Don't need anything for now...
I'll take cartridges for AK-74...
Give me grenades, they really help against the evil...
For AKM? For AK-47? I'll take them, I guess...
I can give five packs of simple cartridges for four bottles.
Five packs, I'll take them...
Two grenades - one vodka. You taking it?
Need grenades, otherwise I wouldn't even bother.
Regular cartridges - five bottles for four packs...
Agreed...
Alright, maybe next time...
There's a possibility to get AKS-74.
AKS-74? How much you asking?
Ten bottles will be enough... Agreed?
Of course! Here they are, the bottles...
Something like that... Military always take care of health, but for sale I only have simple medkits.
How much you asking?
For a pair of regular medkits...
Deal!
Decide for yourself...
Barter

%c[255,160,160,160]Ammo, for 1 first level artifact:
%c[default] 12x70 buckshot - 5 packs
 12x76 canister shot - 3 packs
 12x76 zhekan - 2 packs
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Weapons:
%c[default] TOZ-34 "Vertikalka" - 2 first level artifacts or 1 second level
 TOZ-66 - for 2 first level artifacts or 1 second level
 Short shotgun MP-133 - 4 first level artifacts or 2 second level
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Health improvement:
%c[default] Medkits - 10 pieces for second level artifact, 5 for first level artifact
 Vodka - 3 bottles for first level artifact
 Antirad - 2 pieces for simple artifact, 5 for better artifact and 15 for third level artifact
 
%c[255,160,160,160]For repair:
%c[default] Repair kits for armor or weapons - 5 pieces for second level artifact
 Case for repair kits - for 2 simple artifacts

%c[255,160,160,160]Exchange for 1 canister of choice:%c[default] 
 
 9x18 AP cartridges - 5 packs
 5.45x39 cartridges - 4 packs
 7.62x39 cartridges - 2 packs
 12x70 buckshot cartridges - 5 packs
 VOG-25 grenades - 3 pieces
 
 Canned food - 5 pieces
 Vodka - 4 pieces
 Medkit - 5 pieces
 Antirad - 3 pieces

%c[255,160,160,160]Exchange for 1 canister of choice:%c[default] 
 
 9x19 AP cartridges - 4 packs
 5.45x39 cartridges - 5 packs
 7.62x39 cartridges - 2 packs
 12x70 buckshot cartridges - 5 packs
 RGD-5 grenades - 10 pieces
 
 Canned food - 7 pieces
 M406 grenades - 3 pieces
 Army medkits - 3 pieces
 Antirad - 3 pieces

%c[255,160,160,160]Exchange for modificates:%c[default] 
 5.45x39 cartridges - 60 packs
 5.45x39 AP cartridges - 40 packs
 7.62x39 cartridges - 30 packs
 7.62x39 AP cartridges - 20 packs
 7.62x54R 7N1 cartridges - 35 packs
 7.62x54R 7N14 cartridges - 25 packs
 7.62x54 SAP cartridges - 15 packs
 VOG-25 shots - 30 pieces
 M406 shots - 30 pieces
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Exchange for mesomodificates:%c[default] 
 7.62x39 cartridges - 50 packs
 7.62x39 AP cartridges - 35 packs
 9x39 SP-6 cartridges - 20 packs
 7.62x54R 7N1 cartridges - 50 packs
 7.62x54R 7N14 cartridges - 40 packs
 7.62x54 SAP cartridges - 30 packs
 VOG-25 shots - 50 pieces
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Exchange for hypermodificates:%c[default] 
 7.62x39 cartridges - 70 packs
 7.62x39 AP cartridges - 50 packs
 9x39 SP-6 cartridges - 30 packs
 7.62x54R 7N1 cartridges - 65 packs
 7.62x54R 7N14 cartridges - 55 packs
 7.62x54 SAP cartridges - 45 packs
 VOG-25 shots - 70 pieces
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Exchange for absolutes:%c[default] 
 9x39 SP-6 cartridges - 40 packs
 7.62x54R 7N1 cartridges - 80 packs
 7.62x54R 7N14 cartridges - 70 packs
 7.62x54 SAP cartridges - 60 packs
 VOG-25 shots - 100 pieces
 SKAT-10 body armor

%c[255,160,160,160]Ammo and equipment:
%c[default] 12x70 buckshot - 90 cartridges for medium artifact
 12x76 canister shot - 60 cartridges for second level artifact
 12x76 zhekan - 40 cartridges for second level artifact
 .357 Magnum cartridges - 3 packs for simple artifact
 NATO underbarrel launcher shots - 4 pieces for simple artifact
 Silencer for Glock 18C pistol - second level artifact
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Weapons:
%c[default] Glock 17 pistol - 3 first level artifacts
 Glock 18C pistol - 1 third level artifact + 1 second level artifact
 BT MP9 submachine gun - 1 third level artifact
 MP-153 shotgun - 4 second level artifacts or 1 third level + 1 first level
 
%c[255,160,160,160]For health:
%c[default] Medkits - 4 pieces for simple artifact, 10 - for better artifact
 Vodka - 2 bottles for first level artifact, 7 - for second level artifact
 Antirad - 1 piece for simple artifact, 4 for better artifact, 10 - for third level artifact
 
%c[255,160,160,160]For repair:
%c[default] Repair kits for armor or weapons - 3 pieces for second level artifact or 1 for simple artifact
 Case for repair kits - 3 first level artifacts

%c[255,160,160,160]Ammo and equipment:
%c[default] 7.62x54 cartridges - 30 pcs. 7N1 or 20 pcs. 7N14, or 10 pcs. 7N26 - for first level artifact
 7.62x39 cartridges - 120 regular for simple artifact
 9x39 cartridges - 150 regular, 120 sniper or 90 armor-piercing for second level artifact
 5.45x39 cartridges - 150 regular for simple artifact
 Grenade launcher shots - 4 VOG-25 for first level artifact
 5.45, 7.62 silencers for assault rifles or 7.62 for SVD - any for second level artifact
 Collimator sights: "Kobra", "Rakurs", "OKP" - any for 2 second level artifacts
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Weapons:
%c[default] "Vityaz-SN" submachine gun - 1 third level artifact
 AK-104 "Tactic" assault rifle - 2 third level artifacts
 VSS "Vintorez" rifle - 1 third level artifact + 1 second level artifact
 AS "Val" assault rifle - 1 third level artifact + 2 second level artifacts
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Medicine:
%c[default] Military medkits - 3 pieces for 2 simple artifacts or for 1 second level artifact

%c[255,160,160,160]Ammo:
%c[default] 5.56x45 cartridges - 150 regular for simple artifact
 F-1 grenades - 3 pieces for simple artifact
 Four grenades for NATO underbarrel launcher, for first level artifact
 7.62x51 NATO cartridges - 80 regular for second level artifact
 Drum with 5.56x45 mm cartridges (100 pcs) for first level artifact
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Weapons:
%c[default] Benelli M4 Super 90 (M1014) shotgun - 5 second level artifacts or 2 third level (may not be in stock)
 HK USP pistol - 3 second level artifacts
 FN FNX-45 pistol - 1 third level artifact
 Springfield 1911 pistol - 2 second level artifacts
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Medicine:
%c[default] Military medkits - 2 pieces for first level artifact
 Antirad - 5 pieces for second level artifact
 
%c[255,160,160,160]For repair:

%c[255,160,160,160].338 Lapua Magnum cartridges and attachments:
%c[default] .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge - 5 packs for 1 third level artifact
 .338 Lapua Magnum AP cartridge - 3 packs for 1 third level artifact
 5.56 silencer - for second level artifact
 7.62 NATO silencer - for second level artifact

%c[255,160,160,160]Ammo:
%c[default] 5.56x45 cartridges - 100 regular for 1 PDA
 M203 underbarrel launcher grenades - 10 pieces for 3 PDAs
 7.62x51 NATO cartridges - 2 packs armor-piercing for 4 PDAs
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Rifles and attachments:
%c[default] M4A1 assault rifle - for 20 PDAs
 G36 assault rifle - 10 PDAs
 SIG SG 552 Commando assault rifle - for 10 PDAs
 AG36 underbarrel grenade launcher (for G36) - for 8 PDAs
 EOTech 553 collimator sight - for 10 PDAs
 11.43 mm silencer - for 5 PDAs
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Medicine:

 Antirad - 3 pieces for 1 PDA
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Equipment:
%c[default] Special forces suit with gas mask - for 10 PDAs

Blind dog tails - 1 piece for 20 buckshot cartridges, 2 pieces for a bottle
 Pseudodog tails - 1 piece for 50 buckshot, for 30 canister shot, or 3 bottles
 Boar hooves - 1 for 30 buckshot or 20 canister shot, 2 hooves for 2 vodkas
 Flesh eyes - for 50 canister shot, or 30 bullets, or 3 bottles
 Bloodsucker tentacle - for 100 canister shot or 50 bullets, well or 10 bottles of vodka

%c[255,160,160,160]Ammo:

 RGD-5 grenades - one for 2 energy drinks
 9x19 regular cartridges - 80 pieces for 3 cans of energy drink
 F-1 grenades - one for canned food and energy drink
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Weapons:

 "Bizon-2" submachine gun - 20 army rations
 SIG Sauer P250 pistol - 10 army rations
 Molot OP-SKS carbine - for 8 hunting sausages
 9mm silencer - 5 hunting sausages

 Vodka - bottle for 4 canned foods

 Weapon repair kit - pair for army ration
 
%c[255,160,160,160]PDAs:

%c[255,160,160,160]Ammo and equipment:
%c[default] 5.45x39 cartridges - 150 regular for 4 vodkas
 RGD-5 grenades - from 1 bottle for 2 grenades
 7.62x39 cartridges for AKM - 120 regular for 5 bottles
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Weapons:
%c[default] AKS-74 assault rifle - 10 bottles
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Medicine:

%c[255,160,160,160]Ammo and equipment:

 F-1 grenades - for now piece for 1 bottle, then we'll see
 PKM machine gun belt (100 pcs) for 6 bottles
 7.62x39 cartridges - 120 regular for 4 bottles
 Drum with 5.45x39 mm cartridges (95 pcs) for 2 bottles
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Weapons:
%c[default] Walther P99 pistol - from 8 bottles, then we'll see
 RPK-74 machine gun - from 20 bottles
 OTs-33 "Pernach" pistol - from 10 bottles for now
 AKM assault rifle - no less than 15 bottles
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Army food and medicine:
%c[default] Army medkits - now one for a bottle, then we'll see
 Ration - for 1 bottle for now

%c[255,160,160,160]For 2nd level artifacts:
%c[default] Barska ELECTRO SIGHT AC10632
 Aimpoint Micro T-1
 1P78 "Kashtan" shooting sight (2.8x magnification)
 
%c[255,160,160,160]For modificates:
%c[default] HK UMP submachine gun .45 caliber
 FN F2000 Tactical (FDE) assault rifle
 RPK-74(P) machine gun
 SVD
 Saiga-12M carbine

 Remington 870 (FD) shotgun
 SV-98M sniper rifle
 MG36 machine gun
 TDI KRISS Vector submachine gun
 PSO-1 optical sight (4x magnification)
 ELCAN DR optical sight (4x magnification)
 HK Schmidt Bender optical sight

 SR-3M "Vikhr" assault rifle
 
%c[255,160,160,160]For absolutes:
%c[default] FN SCAR-H rifle
 PKM Tactical machine gun
 AWM-F sniper rifle

%c[255,160,160,160]Cloak tailoring:
%c[default] Brown cloak - two tanned hides + second level artifact
 Brown cloak with gas mask - two tanned hides + two second level artifacts
 Black cloak - four tanned hides + third level artifact
 Black cloak with gas mask - four tanned hides + third and second level artifacts

%c[255,160,160,160]Cloak repair:
%c[default] For any cloak - money + bottle of vodka
Let's have some fun, Baldy? What are we betting?
Ahem... You're too lucky, Marked One. I'm out of artifacts, maybe tomorrow there will be more.
As usual. My good artifact, against your 30,000 rubles, or a simple artifact against 15,000. What are you playing for?
Then - see you tomorrow!
Let's go for a simple artifact. Here's the dough.
I'll try to win a normal artifact, here's thirty grand.
I changed my mind, I won't play.
Yeah, rolling...
Alright, rolling...
Well, with God...
Eh! Here we go...
No, had enough fun.
Yeah, you lost, Marked One...\nMaybe we'll play again?
You're lucky, Marked One, take the artifact and your money...\nMaybe we'll play again?
Draw! Here's your money, Marked One...\nMaybe we'll play again?
You lost, Marked One, your money's gone...\nMaybe we'll play again?
Look at that, you won...\nMaybe we'll play again?
Draw! Here's your money, Marked One...\nMaybe we'll play again?
Listen, Wolf. How do you guys get vodka?
Vodka? Different ways, why do you need it?
Kuznetsov, the one under the bridge, only agrees to deal for vodka. I went to Sidorovich, and he wants artifacts...

Ha! Sidor is quite the schemer... Try talking to his guard. He has his own vodka supply channel. But he doesn't sell just like that - you see, he's bored, so he suggests throwing dice. If you're lucky, you can win a lot of vodka...
Stas, bored? Want to play? What are the stakes?
No, Marked One, not now. Want to get some sleep.
Well, you've left me without pants! Sorry, I don't have any more vodka for today. Come back tomorrow.
Let's play. Bet an artifact against my seven half-liters of crystal-clear drink. Well, if you don't have artifacts, then we can play for money, one and a half grand per bottle.
Alright, see you tomorrow.
I can't right now. Wait a bit, okay? In about fifteen minutes, well, maybe in half an hour, come back...
Uh... Don't get it.
Maybe we'll play again?
No problem. My stakes are firm. And what from you is on the line: artifact or money?
Sorry, friend. You won everything I had. Come back tomorrow, there'll be more.
Take the artifact and... Let's start!
Here's a grand and five hundred more! Let's go.
Hmm... I changed my mind about playing.
Well, let's risk it! Rolling...
Alright, rolling...
Now me! With God...
Eh! Here we go...
I won! You're screwed.
You're lucky, Marked One, take back your artifact and bottles.
Draw! Take back your stuff.
You lost, Marked One, your money's gone.
Look at that, you won.
Draw! Returning the money.
Alright, had enough fun.
I have an unusual artifact!
Which one?
Modificate.
Mesomodificate.
Hypermodificate.
Absolute.
You know, I just remembered... I need to go.
Good business. I can offer you for it: 5.45x39 cartridges, 7.62x39 cartridges, 7.62x54R cartridges, VOG-25 shots, M406 shots. What do you choose?
I need 5.45x39 cartridges.
I need 5.45x39 AP cartridges.
I need 7.62x39 cartridges.
I need 7.62x39 AP cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R 7N1 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R 7N14 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R AP cartridges.
I need VOG-25 shots.
I need M406 shots.
Good business. I can offer you for it: 7.62x39 cartridges, 9x39 cartridges, 7.62x54R cartridges, VOG-25 shots. What do you choose?
I need 7.62x39 cartridges.
I need 7.62x39 AP cartridges.
I need 9x39 SP-6 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R 7N1 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R 7N14 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R AP cartridges.
I need VOG-25 shots.
Good business. I can offer you for it: 7.62x39 cartridges, 9x39 cartridges, 7.62x54R cartridges, VOG-25 shots. What do you choose?
I need 7.62x39 cartridges.
I need 7.62x39 AP cartridges.
I need 9x39 SP-6 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R 7N1 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R 7N14 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R AP cartridges.
I need VOG-25 shots.
Good business. I can offer you for it: 9x39 cartridges, 7.62x54R cartridges, VOG-25 shots, SKAT-10 body armor. What do you choose?
I need 9x39 SP-6 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R 7N1 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R 7N14 cartridges.
I need 7.62x54R AP cartridges.
I need VOG-25 shots.
I need SKAT-10 body armor.
Well, and I need the corresponding artifact, and in excellent condition, if you suddenly forgot. So what will you pay with?
Oh, don't whine. Here, take it. The fly... did nothing.
Yeah, wonderful. Order accepted, Marked One. If you have any other needs - come by.
Yeah, wonderful. Order accepted, Marked One. Your goods will be at the military checkpoint in a day, on the west of Swamps. Everything as before.
Wait, Sidorovich, I'll come by... But where's my goods?!
Got it. Then see you later.

Goods? Ah... you're one of those... ordering for the first time, don't know anything. Your goods are at Swamps. You know the military checkpoint on the west, guarding the scientists? With that tower... That's where your order is. Everything's arranged and agreed with them. Go and pick it up. Just not today. Go tomorrow. Your order will be with them in a day. So get some sleep, eat, charge up... Bought matches?
Wait with your matches... At Swamps, in a day? Why not pick up here?!

For what reason! First, I don't keep military property in commercial quantities, just small stuff. Second, I have arrangements with... certain people. I'm basically just a middleman, finding clients for them, and they... also help me with some things. Got it? In short, tomorrow at Swamps you'll get everything from the military.
Well, that's what... Alright, I understand everything.
Marked One, if you came to order something, you haven't picked up your previous package! First run to Swamps for what's due, and then - please come for a chat... preferably, not empty-handed.
Right, what a garden head...
The choice doesn't impress... Staying with what I have.
Greetings, stalker, trading anything?
Greetings to you too. Trading?
Well I'm a trader... Everyone knows me as Sanya Banker, I exchange artifacts. Good ones for simpler ones, regular exchange, so to speak. And what's your name?
I'm Marked One.

Well then, Marked One, if you need anything, contact me, I'm here today. For each high category artifact I can offer two artifacts of lower category. Or, if you want, four low category artifacts for one higher category. Fair, I think.
What does "here today" mean?

Well, I don't stay in one place, a day or two I trade in Bar, then at the Freedomers' base, then I'll go further into the Zone. Lots of stalkers, lots of artifacts, so I move around... Think in half a year I'll retire, go to the mainland. Buy myself a villa in the Bahamas, bring girls...
Ah! It's you, Marked One... Got anything?
Yeah, was passing by, thought I'd say hello...
Hello then! If you want to trade anything, just say...
I'm about artifact exchange. Want to trade quick?

No problem. Looking for something specific or doesn't matter? Reminder: in the first case I give two desired first level artifacts in exchange for a second level artifact, no lower than third given, in excellent condition. In the second case any second level artifact will do, but you'll get a pig in a poke. But three whole ones.
Sorry, Marked One, I'm empty. Had to turn in excess to Sakharov, he has an unplanned experiment coming up. Come back tomorrow.
I need something specific. Will this artifact work?
Any will do for me. Here's the artifact.
Damn! Forgot to bring the exchange fund. I'll come back.
Quite. Let's go in order: which artifact do you want to get first?
So... Here's one, here's the second and... third. Order?
Yeah, thanks. Now let's see what we have here...
"Jellyfish".
"Wrenched".
"Stone Blood".
"Sparkler".
"Droplet".
"Slime".
"Thorn".
Moment... So, this isn't it... Here, please.\nNow the second. What does monsieur desire?
I had such an artifact somewhere. Right, here it is. Take it.
I see some stalkers walking around in exoskeletons, how could I get one?
You need it? It's expensive, breaks down, maintenance isn't cheap. Calm down.
Well it's not burning, but you understand - have to carry a lot, and with such a mechanism it'll be much more convenient.

Why are you running around the Zone like a truck... Alright, considering my good attitude towards you, I'll try to ask my suppliers, maybe someone will throw one in. But I warn you right away that it'll cost you a pretty penny, or rather - artifacts.
And what do you want?

First I'll negotiate with the supplier, and in about two-three days I'll let you know how it goes. You understand, it's a unique item, doesn't lie around in warehouses. And you prepare capsules meanwhile... Four pieces will be just right, considering delivery troubles. Clear?
Now that's steep... I'll think more about whether I need it at all.
I collected the capsules, you know, the ones for the exoskeleton.
You thought for a long time, I was starting to forget.
Take it. Took a while...
Good job. Here's your exoskeleton. But I warn you, wear it carefully, carefully, no returns.
Heavy, damn thing. But thanks anyway.
I see some stalkers walking around in exoskeletons, how could I get one?
You need it? It's expensive, breaks down, maintenance isn't cheap. Calm down.
Well it's not burning, but you understand - have to carry a lot, and with such a mechanism it'll be much more convenient.

Why are you running around the Zone like a truck... Alright, considering my good attitude towards you, I'll try to ask my suppliers, maybe someone will throw one in. But I warn you right away that it'll cost you a pretty penny, or rather - artifacts.
And what do you want?

First I'll negotiate with the supplier, and in about two-three days I'll let you know how it goes. You understand, it's a unique item, doesn't lie around in warehouses. And you prepare capsules meanwhile... Four pieces will be just right, considering delivery troubles. Clear?
Now that's steep... I'll think more about whether I need it at all.
I collected the capsules, you know, the ones for the exoskeleton.
You thought for a long time, I was starting to forget.
Take it. Took a while...
Good job. Here's your exoskeleton. But I warn you, wear it carefully, carefully, no returns.
Heavy, damn thing. But thanks anyway.
I see some stalkers walking around in exoskeletons, how could I get one?
You need it? It's expensive, breaks down, maintenance isn't cheap. Calm down.
Well it's not burning, but you understand - have to carry a lot, and with such a mechanism it'll be much more convenient.

Why are you running around the Zone like a truck... Alright, considering my good attitude towards you, I'll try to ask my suppliers, maybe someone will throw one in. But I warn you right away that it'll cost you a pretty penny, or rather - artifacts.
And what do you want?

First I'll negotiate with the supplier, and in about two-three days I'll let you know how it goes. You understand, it's a unique item, doesn't lie around in warehouses. And you prepare capsules meanwhile... Four pieces will be just right, considering delivery troubles. Clear?
Now that's steep... I'll think more about whether I need it at all.
I collected the capsules, you know, the ones for the exoskeleton.
You thought for a long time, I was starting to forget.
Take it. Took a while...
Good job. Here's your exoskeleton. But I warn you, wear it carefully, carefully, no returns.
Heavy, damn thing. But thanks anyway.
What can you give me for PDAs?
Let's see: assault rifle - have, scope for assault rifle - have, underbarrel launcher - also have. Ammo-shammo, grenades for underbarrel, medicine, armor... Everything's there. Say, what you need?
Hmm... Let's see what else there is.
Don't need anything for now.
What kind of assault rifles and gadgets for them? And how many PDAs?
Ammo-shammo, grenades for underbarrel? How many and what kind?
And what medicine? I'd take something.
Got armor? What kind and for how much?

Take scope, very rare goods. Can give EOTech 553 for ten PDAs. AG36 underbarrel grenade launcher also have for 8 PDAs. .45 caliber silencer in stock - 5 PDAs. Want assault rifle? Two tens of PDAs for legendary "M4A1", and for ten PDAs - new "G36" or "SIG-552"!
Alright. I'll take the SIG.
I'll take EOTech 553, here's the PDA.
M4A1? Alright, let me take it.
I'll take the G36. Think it'll come in handy.
Here's the PDA for the grenade launcher.
I'll take the silencer, here are your PDAs.
I'll drop by later. Need to think.
Right choice, good machine.
Want EOTech 553? Here take. Completely new. Fly didn't sit.
Ah, good machine. Used myself right now.
German, accurate. Will shoot squirrel eye.
Oy-oy. Tearing from heart...
Silencer? Here take.
Need ammo? One PDA give - get 100 simple ammo for 5.56 assault rifle. Four PDAs bring - get 2 armor-piercing NATO 7.62 by 51 packs... Three PDAs give - take 10 underbarrel grenades.
Give me hundred regular cartridges. Here's the PDA.
I'll take 7.62. Here's the PDA.
Need grenades. I owe 3 PDAs.
I'll manage for now...
Here you ammo-shammo. All, like I said.
Serious ammo, respect, yes! Any punk will be afraid of just the sound of the shot, I tell truth!
Think good! Always need like this - think!
Want be healthy? Give PDA - take scientific medkit. Give other PDA - take three antirad shots.
Agreed on medkit. Trading.
Antirad? I'll take them. Here's the PDA.
I'll manage for now. Mine's enough.
Have medkit - you live, no medkit - you no live.
Radiation - such infection! Always need pills.
Need armor? Have armor with gas mask - ten PDAs.
With gas mask, yes? I'll take it for collection, I guess.
I'll think. Won't take anything for now.
Good choice. Glass special - always clean. Wear in health!
Listen, Vakhtang... You're supposedly a serious trader, but I don't see any exoskeletons for sale.
Why offend, dear, why no, everything have. Only such thing stalker no pocket will be. Very expensive. Therefore no on display. Why, if no one no buy. Commerce.
Expensive is relative. Maybe we can still agree on price? Especially people say your exoskeletons are the best.
For money and PDAs such goods I no sell. Thing unique, need make order, wait, in short... need think.
And what do you want?
Our chief, was looking one artifact, very rare and very expensive. Why - no know, but need. Called electric beads. Bring such, then for exoskeleton and talk will be.
Well you've really pushed it! Where to find such an artifact?.. I'll think more.
So I have recipe for this Zone wonder, can cook it, prepare the exo.
No artifact - no exo. Will be artifact, then and come.
You look, how fast. Vakhtang always keeps word. Will be, will be you exo. Two-three days come. While back and forth, supply goods, time need. I tell.
Found the artifact you wanted for the exoskeleton.
Ah... Long you walked, I already starting forget.
So what about the armor? Deal was: I give artifact, you give exo.
Vakhtang always keeps word. Take exo, completely new, will be handsome.
